notes.androidSDKPath: Path to your Android SDK. Leave empty to use ANDROID_HOME env var
notes.emulatorName: Name of your emulator AVD. Leave as 'auto' to use first Pixel emulator found
notes.emulatorWaitTime: Maximum time (ms) to wait for emulator boot. Default: 120000 (2 minutes)
notes.buildTimeout: Maximum time (ms) for Vite build. Default: 300000 (5 minutes)
notes.autoLaunchStudio: Automatically open Android Studio after sync
notes.autoInstallAPK: Try to install and launch APK if already built
